description.en:
"Let's make the greatest chicken!!" Sangwook's father took all the severance pay and handed it over to an acquaintance. However, within a few days of opening, the father had an accident, and the operation of the store became the responsibility of Sang Wook, a college student.... Sangwook's chicken flavor, which he made for the first time in his life, is a trash that he cannot even imagine! Sang-wook tries to throw the whole body to protect the store, but I can't see the answer Sangwook's trial to make the best chicken!

Sangwook is forced to ask for help from his greatest enemy, Hyeri to help him find the greatest Fried Chicken Recipe! Will Sangwook find the recipe in peace?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Greatest-Chicken/3293)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Mcomics>](https://www.mcomics.co.kr/contents?idx=5553)
description.id:
Han Sang Wook sedang di ujung tanduk! Ayahnya yang membuka restoran ayam goreng kecelakaan sehingga Sang Wook terpaksa mengurusi restoran tersebut. Dia tidak punya keahlian masak ayam goreng sama sekali. Restorannya terancam bangkrut karena tidak ada pembeli. Sang Wook terpaksa minta tolong musuh bebuyutannya, Hyeri, untuk membantunya mencari resep ayam goreng. Hyeri pun mengajaknya berkeliling negeri untuk mencari ayam goreng terenak. Apakah Sang Wook bisa menemukan resep itu dengan lancar?

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Greatest-Chicken/3293)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Mcomics>](https://www.mcomics.co.kr/contents?idx=5553)
description.ko:
“최고의 치킨을 만들어 보자!!!”

상욱의 아버지가 모든 퇴직금을 투자해 지인사기로 넘겨받은 치킨집 치먹닭! 그러나 오픈한 지 며칠 되지 않아 아버지는 사고를 당하고, 가게의 운영은 대학생 상욱의 몫이 되어 버리고….
생전 처음 만들어 본 상욱의 치킨맛은 감히 상상조차 할 수 없는 쓰레기! 상욱은 매장을 지키기 위해 온몸을 던져 노력하지만 도무지 답은 보이질 않는데….

최고의 치킨을 만들기 위한 상욱의 대장정!

---

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Greatest-Chicken/3293)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Mcomics>](https://www.mcomics.co.kr/contents?idx=5553)
